scripts.deploy: npm run build && aws s3 sync dist/assets s3://bns-tool/assets --cache-control "public, max-age=31536000, immutable" --delete && aws s3 sync dist s3://bns-tool --exclude "assets/*" --cache-control "no-cache, must-revalidate, max-age=0" --delete && aws s3 cp dist/index.html s3://bns-tool/index.html --content-type text/html --cache-control "no-cache, must-revalidate, max-age=0" --metadata-directive REPLACE
